snippet: Amalgamated Bank announced on Wednesday that two financiers, Wilbur L. Ross Jr. and Ronald W. Burkle, had closed a deal giving them 41 percent ownership in the bank. Amalgamated said the money would be used to shore up its capital ratio and expand.
